data.actual_result: Group name is an empty string and welcome message uses that empty string
data.expected_result: Group name should be "Unnamed" and welcome message should be "Welcome to the beginning of the Unnamed group"
data.short_description: Welcome message for group DMs with default name will use an empty string as a group name
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new new group DM - Kick everyone but yourself from it
